channel.title: Linux on Junk Drawer
channel.description: Recent content in Linux on Junk Drawer

item.title: Linux Update üêß
item.description: I’ve been tinkering around with Linux Mint at home for a few weeks now and decided to write a quick update on how it has been going so far. I decided to update my home computer to dual boot into Linux Mint and Win11 after getting annoyed with the Microsoft pushing onedrive and the m365 accounts on bootup. I did still keep the windows partition active as a fallback, particularly for software compatiblity if I don’t want to fuss with wine.
